# Chronicler's Kit
## Overview
This bundle contains a map case, two vials of ink, two inkpens, 10 sheets of paper, two blank journals, a pound of fine powder for drying ink, and a 20-foot measuring cord. The supplies usually suffice for chronicling a single expedition of not more than 2 monthsâ€™ duration.

**Price** 40 gp; **Weight** 4-1/2 lbs.

**Source:** Ultimate Equipment, pg. 56; Pathfinder Society Field Guide, pg. 47
